CBOT.PA.summary: CBo Territoria SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme develops, promotes, manages, and sells real estate properties in France. Its residential properties include serviced plots, villas, townhouses, and apartments; and commercial real estate properties comprise offices, businesses, warehouses, parcels, divisible lots, and business districts. The company also owns approximately 3,000 hectares of land in the island of RÃ©union. CBo Territoria SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme is based in Sainte-Marie, France.

GALIM.PA.summary: Galimmo SCA operates as a real estate company in Europe. As of June 30, 2019, it manages a portfolio of 52 shopping malls. The company was formerly known as C&Co SCA and changed its name to Galimmo SCA in September 2016. Galimmo SCA was founded in 1902 and is based in Paris, France. Galimmo SCA is a subsidiary of Galimmo Real Estate.

NQ9.F.summary: Nexity SA operates as a real estate company in Europe and internationally. The company operates through Individual Clients Division, Commercial Clients Division, and Other Activities segments. It develops new homes and subdivisions; and new or refurbished office buildings, high-rises, business parks, logistics facilities, retail property, and hotels. The company also provides property management services comprising rental management, sales and lettings, and managing agent services; manages serviced residences for students and for seniors; distributes real estate products; offers real estate brokerage, financial advisory, and insurance advisory services; real estate services, including rental management and property management, consultancy, and rental of short-duration work spaces. In addition, it engages in the villes and projets, and pre-development urban regeneration project activities; administration, coordination, and development of real estate franchise networks for individual clients; investment activities, as well as startup in the incubation phase. Additionally, it serves as a partner for local authorities for the design and execution of urban projects or large-scale urban regeneration schemes. Nexity SA was founded in 1995 and is based in Paris, France.
